# Description of DataSchema variable

The description of harmonised variable is the following:


* Short name: `age`
* Variable label: `age`
* Variable description: `Age of participant at each wave`
* Domain: `Socio-demographic and economic characteristics`
* Value type: `continuous`
* Category missings: 

**Code** | **Category Label**
----| ------------------
991 | CAPI/interviewer error
992 | Impute
993 | Disable to measure
994 | Not attempt/not done
995 | Does not answer
996 | Not applicable
997 | Refuse
998 | Do not know
999 | Missing

```{r lab, echo=FALSE}
ds_label <- "Age"
ds_label_all <- "Age of participant at each wave"
```

| **Missings** | `-2 = refusal; -1 = don't know` | `-2 = refusal; -1 = don't know` |  | `-2 = refusal; -1 = don't know` |
| **Description** |  |  |  |  |

#### Harmonisation algorithm
To compute the harmonize variable from the study-specific variables it has to be computed by applying the following formula: 

* `date of interview - date of birth`

**R script:**

```{r harmo1}
SHARE_ds_w1 <- tibble(id=SHARE_w1_age$id)

#harmonise year of birth
SHARE_w1_age$year_of_birth <- car::recode(SHARE_w1_age$yrbirth, "-2=997; -1=998;  NA=999")

#harmonise month of birth
SHARE_w1_age$month_of_birth <- car::recode(SHARE_w1_age$mobirth, "-2=997; -1=998;  NA=999")

#harmonise month of interview
SHARE_w1_age$month_of_interview <- car::recode(SHARE_w1_age$int_month, "-2=997; -1=998;  c(13,NA)='999'")

#harmonise year of interview
SHARE_w1_age$year_of_interview <- car::recode(SHARE_w1_age$int_year, "NA=999")

#function to compute the age
comp_age <- function(y_birth, m_birth, y_int, m_int, miss){
  #first, it's computed the age of all
  age <- NULL
  age[m_int<m_birth] <- y_int[m_int<m_birth]-y_birth[m_int<m_birth]-1
  age[m_int>=m_birth] <- y_int[m_int>=m_birth]-y_birth[m_int>=m_birth]
  age[m_birth>900] <- y_int[m_birth>900]-y_birth[m_birth>900]
  
  #It's emphasized the individues that has missing
  mis <- rep(0,length(y_birth))
  for(i in 1:length(miss)){
    mis[which(y_int==miss[i])] <- miss[i]
  }
  mis <- rep(0,length(y_birth))
  for(i in 1:length(miss)){
    mis[which(y_birth==miss[i])] <- miss[i]
  }
  
  age[mis!=0] <- mis[mis!=0]
  
  age

}

SHARE_ds_w1$age <- comp_age(y_birth=SHARE_w1_age$year_of_birth , m_birth=SHARE_w1_age$month_of_birth ,
         y_int=SHARE_w1_age$year_of_interview , m_int=SHARE_w1_age$month_of_interview , miss=c(997, 998, 999))



SHARE_ds_w1$age <- labelled(SHARE_ds_w1$age, labels = c("Missing"=999, "Do not know"=998, "Refuse"=997, "Not applicable"=996, "Does not answer"=995,  "Not attempt not done"=994, "Disable to measure"=993, "Impute"=992, "CAPI interviewer error"=991))
```

```{r descript1, echo=F}
kable(Continuous_summary(vari, missing_values = c(991, 992, 993, 994, 995, 996, 997, 998, 999))[2], caption = "Values")
pander(Continuous_summary(vari, missing_values = c(991, 992, 993, 994, 995, 996, 997, 998, 999))$summary, caption = "Summary")
ggplot(SHARE_ds_w1, aes(age)) + geom_bar(stat="count", width=0.4, fill="steelblue") + xlab("Age") + ylab("Frequency")+xlim(25,105)
```

### Wave 4 

#### Study-specific variable description




| **Name** |`mobirth`| `yrbirth`| `int_month_w4` | `int_year_w4` |

| **Label** | `month of birth` | `year of birth`| `interview month` | `interview year` |
| **Table name** | `sharew4_rel1-1-1_cv_r_without_noint` | `idem` | `idem` | `idem` |
| **Categories** | `1 = january; 2 = february; 3 = march; 4 = april; 5 = may; 6 = june; 7 = july; 8 = august; 9 = september; 10 = october; 11 = november; 12 = december; 13 = today` |  | `1 = january; 2 = february; 3 = march; 4 = april; 5 = may; 6 = june; 7 = july; 8 = august; 9 = september; 10 = october; 11 = november; 12 = december; 13 = today` |  |
| **Missings** | `-2 = refusal; -1 = don't know` | `-2 = refusal; -1 = don't know` | `-2 = refusal; -1 = don't know` | `-3 = implausible/ suspected wrong` |
| **Description** |  |  |  |  |

#### Harmonisation algorithm
To compute the harmonize variable from the study-specific variables it has to be computed by applying the following formula: 

* `date of interview - date of birth`

**R script:**

```{r harmo4}
SHARE_ds_w4 <- tibble(id=SHARE_w4_age$id)

#harmonise year of birth
SHARE_w4_age$yrbirth <- car::recode(SHARE_w4_age$yrbirth, "-2=997; -1=998;  NA=999")

#harmonise month of birth
SHARE_w4_age$mobirth <- car::recode(SHARE_w4_age$mobirth, "-2=997; -1=998;  NA=999")

#harmonise month of interview
SHARE_w4_age$int_month_w4 <- car::recode(SHARE_w4_age$int_month_w4, "-2=997; -1=998;  c(13,NA)='999'")

#harmonise year of interview
SHARE_w4_age$int_year_w4 <- car::recode(SHARE_w4_age$int_year_w4,  "-3=999; NA=2011")

#function to compute the age
comp_age <- function(y_birth, m_birth, y_int, m_int, miss){
  #first, it's computed the age of all
  age <- NULL
  age[m_int<m_birth] <- y_int[m_int<m_birth]-y_birth[m_int<m_birth]-1
  age[m_int>=m_birth] <- y_int[m_int>=m_birth]-y_birth[m_int>=m_birth]
  age[m_birth>900] <- y_int[m_birth>900]-y_birth[m_birth>900]
  
  #It's emphasized the individues that has missing
  mis <- rep(0,length(y_birth))
  for(i in 1:length(miss)){
    mis[which(y_int==miss[i])] <- miss[i]
  }
  mis <- rep(0,length(y_birth))
  for(i in 1:length(miss)){
    mis[which(y_birth==miss[i])] <- miss[i]
  }
  
  age[mis!=0] <- mis[mis!=0]
  
  age

}

SHARE_w4_age$age <- comp_age(y_birth=SHARE_w4_age$yrbirth , m_birth=SHARE_w4_age$mobirth ,
         y_int=SHARE_w4_age$int_year_w4 , m_int=SHARE_w4_age$int_month_w4 , miss=c(997, 998, 999))


SHARE_ds_w4$age <- car::recode(SHARE_w4_age$age, "0=999; NA=999")
SHARE_ds_w4$age <- labelled(SHARE_ds_w4$age, labels = c("Missing"=999, "Do not know"=998, "Refuse"=997, "Not applicable"=996, "Does not answer"=995,  "Not attempt not done"=994, "Disable to measure"=993, "Impute"=992, "CAPI interviewer error"=991))
```
